entries.name: Faceless One (N'raqi)

traits.name: Mind Flay
traits.effect: Saps clarity; target suffers -1 on next action.

traits.name: Alien Resilience
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage slightly this round.

entries.description: Void-spawned lieutenants of the Old Gods, all eyes, tendrils, and whispers.

entries.name: C’Thrax (Faceless General)

traits.name: Annihilating Roar
traits.effect: Crushes morale of nearby foes.

traits.name: Abyssal Carapace
traits.effect: Hardened hide dulls heavy blows.

entries.description: War-champions among the faceless, towering horrors bearing Old God sigils.

entries.name: Forgotten One

traits.name: Gibbering Maw
traits.effect: On hit, target loses morale.

traits.name: Unearthly Flesh
traits.effect: Half-real tissue disperses some damage.

entries.description: A lumpen offshoot of Old God growth; mouths and eyes without reason.

entries.name: Eye of the Old God

traits.name: Gaze of Madness
traits.effect: Inflicts confusion; target falters next action.

traits.name: Levitate Carapace
traits.effect: Hovering form avoids ground hazards.

entries.description: A floating ocular horror that projects the will of its master.

entries.name: Corruptor Tentacle

traits.name: Grasp
traits.effect: Immobilizes a foe briefly.

traits.name: Oozing Blight
traits.effect: On hit, leaves a lingering, weakening slime.

entries.description: A sinewed conduit for void corruption, writhing with malevolence.

entries.name: Void Lasher

traits.name: Void Lash
traits.effect: Shadow lash weakens next enemy action.

traits.name: Umbral Hide
traits.effect: Partly phase-shifted body blunts damage.

entries.description: Fast, tendriled attackers that lash minds and flesh alike.

entries.name: Silithid Worker

traits.name: Hive Mind
traits.effect: Gains morale when near other silithid.

traits.name: Burrow
traits.effect: May evade by tunneling once per encounter.

entries.description: Base drones of the Silithid hives, tireless diggers and swarmers.

entries.name: Silithid Soldier

traits.name: Pincer Strike
traits.effect: Deals extra damage when flanking.

traits.name: Carapace
traits.effect: Reduces first hit taken each round.

entries.description: Hardened warriors forming the bulk of hive armies.

entries.name: Silithid Wasp

traits.name: Sting
traits.effect: Applies Poisoned (-1 HP for 2 turns).

traits.name: Dive
traits.effect: Deals extra damage when striking from height.

entries.description: Aerial attackers used to harass and scatter foes.

entries.name: Silithid Colossus

traits.name: Stomp
traits.effect: Shakes terrain, reducing morale of nearby foes.

traits.name: Thick Carapace
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage significantly.

entries.description: Titanic Silithid war-beasts worshipped as avatars of the hive.

entries.name: Nerubian Warrior

traits.name: Piercing Spear
traits.effect: On hit, ignores light armor.

traits.name: Hive Discipline
traits.effect: Resists morale loss when near allies.

entries.description: Soldiers of Azjol-Nerub, disciplined spiderfolk of the ancient empire.

entries.name: Nerubian Spiderlord

traits.name: Web Snare
traits.effect: Immobilizes enemy briefly.

traits.name: Carapace Guard
traits.effect: Allies behind them take reduced damage.

entries.description: Towering Nerubian elites who anchor lines with webs and carapace.

entries.name: Nerubian Seer

traits.name: Shadow Bolt
traits.effect: Saps target’s morale.

traits.name: Mind Web
traits.effect: Links two enemies; both suffer on one’s failure.

entries.description: Sorcerers who weave both magic and webbing into their warfare.

entries.name: Nerubian Commander

traits.name: Command Aura
traits.effect: Nearby Nerubians gain +1 morale.

traits.name: Tactical Webbing
traits.effect: Can shield allies with layered web walls.

entries.description: Strategic leaders of Nerubian armies, often resisting Scourge domination.

entries.name: Void Spawn

traits.name: Entropy Bite
traits.effect: Saps vigor; target suffers -1 morale.

traits.name: Shadow Merge
traits.effect: Harder to target in dim light.

entries.description: Small voidlings congealed from ambient shadow.

entries.name: Void Tendril

traits.name: Grasping Shade
traits.effect: Briefly restrains a foe.

traits.name: Wisp of Night
traits.effect: Reduces ranged damage taken this round.

entries.description: Strands of living shadow that clutch and bind.

entries.name: Void Wraith

traits.name: Mind Shear
traits.effect: Disorients; target’s next attack falters.

traits.name: Umbral Form
traits.effect: Reduces incoming damage this round.

entries.description: A lean silhouette of malice, stalking from the edges of reality.

entries.name: Rift Keeper

traits.name: Rift Pulse
traits.effect: Warps space; nearby foes lose morale.

traits.name: Phase Anchor
traits.effect: Immune to forced movement this round.

entries.description: A gate-warden that stabilizes and feeds from a tear in the veil.

entries.name: Umbral Emanation

traits.name: Shadow Surge
traits.effect: Area burst that saps resolve.

traits.name: Hollow Core
traits.effect: Mundane strikes glance through its center.

entries.description: A condensed knot of shadowstuff, scarcely bound into shape.

entries.name: Flesh Horror

traits.name: Rending Claw
traits.effect: Applies Bleeding for 2 turns.

traits.name: Unstable Tissue
traits.effect: On taking heavy hit, splatters weakening ichor.

entries.description: Meat and bone rallied by alien will into a hateful shape.

entries.name: Shambling Aberration

traits.name: Crush
traits.effect: Heavy slam that staggers target.

traits.name: Maddening Stench
traits.effect: Nearby foes suffer -1 morale.

entries.description: A lopsided heap of sinew animated by whispers.

entries.name: Nightmare Amalgam

traits.name: Dream Rot
traits.effect: Corrupts target’s resolve; -1 next action.

traits.name: Thorned Husk
traits.effect: Contact returns a sliver of damage to attacker.

entries.description: A tangle of nightmare briars and flesh, half-remembered by a sleeping world.

entries.name: Corrupted Horror

traits.name: Bog of Dread
traits.effect: Exudes muck that slows and disheartens.

traits.name: Thrum of Madness
traits.effect: Low drone unsettles nearby foes.

entries.description: A nightmare-touched brute that leaves dread wherever it lurches.

entries.name: Mana Anomaly

traits.name: Mana Shock
traits.effect: Disrupts spellcasting; -1 to magical actions next turn.

traits.name: Arcane Sheen
traits.effect: Reduces incoming spell damage this round.

entries.description: A knot of stray mana that learned to hate the hands that wove it.

entries.name: Arcane Aberration

traits.name: Prismatic Burst
traits.effect: A cascade of colors that dazes.

traits.name: Runic Lattice
traits.effect: Glyphwork disperses some damage.

entries.description: Arcane geometry accreted into hostility.

entries.name: Temporal Anomaly

traits.name: Chrono Shear
traits.effect: Delays a target’s next action.

traits.name: Phase Slip
traits.effect: Half-present form reduces damage taken this round.

entries.description: A time-slipped echo made resentful by paradox.

entries.name: Unstable Construct

traits.name: Overload
traits.effect: Discharges energy; nearby foes lose morale.

traits.name: Fracture
traits.effect: On heavy damage, splits off a lesser fragment.

entries.description: A half-finished puzzle of sigils and will, looking for something to ruin.

entries.name: Living Ooze

traits.name: Dissolve
traits.effect: Erodes armor; target suffers -1 to defense next turn.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.effect: Squeezes through, ignoring minor obstacles.

entries.description: A hungry slick of protoplasm animated by wrong magic.

entries.name: Corrupted Slime

traits.name: Toxic Spill
traits.effect: Leaves a patch that weakens those who cross it.

traits.name: Divide
traits.effect: On defeat, splits into two weaker slimes.

entries.description: An ooze swollen with void or plague; more a spill than a creature.

entries.name: Acidic Amalgam

traits.name: Corrode
traits.effect: Inflicts a stacking -1 defense for 2 turns.

traits.name: Splashback
traits.effect: Melee attackers take a drip of acid damage.

entries.description: A vat-born tangle of acids and regrets, sloshing toward the nearest scream.
